sentence: In early trading on Monday, shares of Xylem ( XYL ) topped the list of the day's best performing components of the S&P 500 index, trading up 2.8%.
Year to date, Xylem registers a 36.5% gain.
And the worst performing S&P 500 component thus far on the day is Salesforce.com ( CRM ), trading down 3.8%.
Salesforce.com is showing a gain of 0.2% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Alliance Data Systems ( ADS ), trading down 2.6%, and Juniper Networks ( JNPR ), trading up 2.6% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
